price: 66. Iš tiesų, jie valgys juos ir jais pripildys savo pilvus.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
